Docs.summary: Class used by to create instances of anomaly detection components, such as trainers and evaluators.

Docs.param: The new threshold value that will be used to determine the label of a data point based on the predicted score by the model.
Docs.summary: Creates a new with the specified . If the provided is the same as the threshold it simply returns . Note that by default the threshold is 0.5 and valid scores range from 0 to 1.
